headline.main: Hurricane Insurance Claims: All About Falling Trees

docs.abstract: Answers to questions about hurricane damage caused by trees.
docs.snippet: Answers to questions about hurricane damage caused by trees.

docs.lead_paragraph: Now that Hurricane Irene has passed, the thoughts of homeowners turn to filing claims for damage caused by the storm. Several Bucks readers had questions about damage caused by trees, so we spoke with representatives of the Insurance Information Institute for some answers.

docs.lead_paragraph: A former colleague from Canada who practiced medicine with me here in the States never hesitated to make one thing clear to me: He couldn't wait to get back. It wasn't the cultural life that he missed, nor was it the ex-girlfriend I always suspected he pined for. It was the medicine.
